LanguageData.EnableElectionsDesc: If disabled, elections will not happen.
LanguageData.ElectionsWillNotHappen: will not happen because this colony is not a democracy.
LanguageData.ElectionsWillDesc: happen on the days: 1, 7 and 15.\nThey only happen if needed.\nLast Election
LanguageData.ElectionDesc: The colonists are gathering to vote for new leader(s).
LanguageData.NoColonistError: Couldn't find a colonist to start the election. This can be caused by: colonists sleeping, assigned to non-joy times, starvation or health issues.
LanguageData.NoLeadersError: Tried to start a election but no colonist is able to be a leader. Remember that social skill is needed.
LanguageData.LeaderStartLesson: A leader has started a lesson on the teaching spot.
LanguageData.WillBeTeacher: will be the teacher. Skills related:
LanguageData.WaitForNewLesson: The colony must wait 24 hours before gathering for a new lesson.
LanguageData.SelectAbleTeacher: Select an able teacher. Trying again.
LanguageData.SpotUnavailableError: The teaching spot is reserved by something else. Trying again.
LanguageData.OneTeacherSpotOnly: Only one teaching spot allowed per colony.
LanguageData.OneBallotBoxOnly: Only one ballot box allowed per colony.
LanguageData.NoLeadersAvailable: No colonist is able to be a leader.
LanguageData.AddLeadermanually: Something bad happened on the election code. Try adding the leaders manually using dev mode.
LanguageData.NoColonistForElectionError: Couldn't find a colonist to start the election. This can be caused by: colonists sleeping, assigned to non-joy times, starvation or health issues.
LanguageData.NoSpotForElectionError: Couldn't find a suitable safe spot for the election.
LanguageData.VoteForLeaders: The colonists will gather and vote for the new leader(s).
LanguageData.RebelDescA: is the chosen one to arrest the unwanted the leader.
LanguageData.RebelDescB: will arrest the leader when possible.
LanguageData.LeaderArrestedDesc: is no longer a leader and was arrested by rebelling colonists.
LanguageData.ElecationCanceled: Leader election cancelled! Something bad happened.
LanguageData.LeaderBecomeUnpopular: a leader of the colony, is becoming unpopular. If
LanguageData.MayStartRebellion: keep being unliked by other colonists, they may start a rebellion to put her out of power.
LanguageData.ColonistRequestA: A colonist approaches the leader and ask for
LanguageData.ColonistRequestE: mandate and won't be able to be elected for a time.
LanguageData.ColonistRequestF: This option will only be given once. Choose carefully.
LanguageData.RebellionDescA: is hated among the colony and other colonists want
LanguageData.CheckColonistsForLectures: Check the colonists which won't attend lectures:
LanguageData.ChooseLeader: Choose the leader you want to force upon your colonists from the list below:
LanguageData.NoColAbleForLeader: No colonists are able to be leaders. They can't be unable to do social-related work.
LanguageData.ChooseGovType: Choose which government type your colony will have:
LanguageData.DictatorshipDesc: The colony will be ruled by one single leader chosen by you. Leadership ends when the dictator dies.
LanguageData.AssignTeacherRoles: Assign teacher roles to leaders on the buttons below.\nClick on the days to cycle between teachers.\nYellow means a random leader will be assigned.
LanguageData.StartElectionDevOnVisMap: Gather colonists to vote for their leaders. Will start a election on the visible map.
LanguageData.ElectionNotify: The colony is already gathering for an election.
LanguageData.DemocracyDesc: Colonists will vote for their leaders. The mandate for each leadership is 1 year.
LanguageData.SelectReportStringA: The selected teacher must have at least level
LanguageData.ReportNotifyStringA: The teacher will only teach a skill if the level is above
LanguageData.BuildBallotBox: Build a ballot box so colonists can organize elections to choose new leaders.
LanguageData.WarningRebellion: WARNING: This leader is very unpopular. Colonists may start a rebellion and possibly arrest this leader!
LanguageData.CautionNotPopular: CAUTION: This leader is not liked very much by the colonists.
